attributes.action: make sure that the Royal Mail don't opt to cut our postal devilery from 6 to 5 days as suggested by Postcomm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail has been told that it can cut deliveries from 6 days to 5 days per week, cutting the Saturday service. We've already lost the 2 posts per day and it seems that standard delivery times are getting later and later. Losing the Saturday will be a blow to residential and  businesses.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
